Dropped from the running list:
* atd (145k) (dropped from the default install)
* bluetooth-applet (replaced by indicator-bluetooth)
* gconf-helper from pulseaudio (695k) (dropped from the default install)
* goa-daemon (gnome-online-account (5M) (dropped from the default install, not used by Unity)
* mousetweaks (2.5M) (dropped from the default image)
* signon-ui (8M) (exit when not needed)
* ubuntu-system-services (5M) (replaced by systemd-services, not activated on boot)

New:
* gvfs-mtp (gvfs mtp backend) (495k)
* indicator-sync (1M) (was not in default quantal)
* irqbalance (375k)
* unity-musicstore-daemon (1.5M) (should it be running when not store account is configured?)
* upstart-file-bridge (213K) (new feature, useful for session jobs)
* pxgsettings processes (libproxy use in geoclue and lenses?)
 
Note: gvfsd-http was added to the 2013-01-16 for some reason but it was not running after login (it's started when using the dash) and the usage depends of the use of the dash
